import './index.scss' import React, { useState } from 'react' import CyberOpsLogo from '../../assets/CYBER_OPS_Transparent.png'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faLinkedin, faGithub, faYoutube, faSkype, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import { faHome, faUser, faEnvelope, faSuitcase, faBars, faClose, } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const Sidebar = () => { const [showNav, setShowNav] = useState(false); return (
setShowNav(false)}>
setShowNav(false)}> setShowNav(false)}> setShowNav(false)} > setShowNav(false)} > setShowNav(false)} icon={faClose} color="#ffffff" size="3x" className='close-icon' />
setShowNav(true)} icon={faBars} color="#000000" size="2x" className='hamburger-icon' />
) } export default Sidebar
